strategy: Event-driven catalyst trading. Focuses on earnings, FDA approvals, M&A rumors, and macro events. Goes where the news is hottest.

positions.reason: Earnings beat + raised guidance, gap up with follow-through buying

trades.reason: China stimulus announcement, gap up on macro catalyst
Stimulus details underwhelming, reversing gains, cut loss
Earnings beat + raised guidance, gap up with follow-through

mistakes: BABA trade was reactive â€” jumped in on headline without reading the details
Should have waited 15 minutes for the gap to settle before entering
lessons: Always read the full catalyst details before trading the headline
Wait for the first 15-min candle to close on gap-ups before entering
daily_review.strategy_evolution: Implementing a 15-minute cooling period after catalysts before entering. Also adding a checklist: read full report, check pre-market volume, verify institutional interest.
